data.author: dP-watchfaces

changelog.release_notes:
3.12
+ Bug fixed and improved ambient light detection.

3.11
+ Recompile for last Pebble firmware
+ Improve low ambient light detection
+ Improved style 18, bug fixed in styles 9, 20 for Pebble Round
+ New styles (22, 23)

3.10
+ New number 7: Health-Kcalories burned.
+ 3 New styles! (styles 19..21).
+ New feature: Night color (used for night or low ambient light)
+ Several styles refined.
+ Improvements.

3.00
+ New number 5: Health distance walked today
+ New number 6: Health step counts today
+ 8 New styles! (11..18)
+ Improvements

2.00
+ 3 New styles!(8, 9 and 10): D4123C, 4D1C32, D4-12-C3.
+ New choice: Use highlight color for minutes instead of hour.
+ Pebble Original compatible
+ New choice: Disable weather (requested by some users), for now the rest of information not rearranged.
+ Solved the mystery of Numbers and Letters: 1:Hour, 2:Minutes, 3:Day, 4:Temperature, A:Bluetooth/Battery-status, B:Month-of-year, C:Day-of-week, D:Weather-condition
+ On next release 3.0... a new Number, 5:Health-steps-count.

data.description:
NUMBLET, numbers and letters.
---
+ LOOK STYLE: 23 different watch face styles composed by Numblets.
Numblets: 1:Hour, 2:Minutes, 3:Day, 4:WeatherTemperature, 5:DistanceWalked, 6:StepCount, 7:KCaloriesBurned, A:Bluetooth/BatteryStatus, B:MonthOfYear, C:DayOfWeek, D:WeatherCondition

+ HIGHLIGHT COLOR: 10 different highlight colors
+ NIGHT COLOR: Choose alternative color used at night or when low ambient light.

+ WEATHER COLOR: weather temperature and/or weather condition colored.
(look at last screenshot animation to learn the weather color coding)

+ HIGHLIGHT MINUTES instead of HOUR: Yes / No
 
+ BLUETOOTH STATUS INDICATOR: C/D connected/disconnected. Shown always or when disconnected only (depending on LOOK STYLE).
+ BATTERY CHARGE INDICATOR: 0..9 (0%..90%), F(Full 100%). Shown always or when charge below 20% only (depending on LOOK STYLE).

+ VIBES ON DISCONNECT/RECONNECT: Yes / No
+ WEATHER UNITS: Temperature in Celsius or Fahrenheit.
+ DISTANCE UNITS: Walked distance in Kilometers or Miles
+ WEATHER LOCATION (Blank for auto detection, ZipCode,CountryCode for manual location)

+ TIME FORMAT (12, 24) (Detected from Pebble watch settings)
+ LANGUAGES (English, Spanish) (detected from Pebble)

+ WEATHER CONDITION LEGEND:
  -(english) SUN:Sunny, CLR:Clear, PCL:Partly-Cloud, CDS:Clouds, RAI:Rain, THN:Thunderstorm, SNW:Snow, FOG:Fog
  -(spanish) SOL:Soleado, CLR:Claro, PNU:Parcialmente-Nublado, NUB:Nublado, LLU:Lluvia, TOR:Tormenta, NVE:Nieve, NBL:Niebla
  (some LOOK STYLEs use 2-letter only)
data.title: Numblet
